@BarryHunt008 Thanks. Ones placed at the coil are still marketed to protect against virus transmission. They also risk damaging the filters.
@joeyfox85 In-duct & coil cleaners are 2 different applications of UV. Coil cleaners eliminate mold & biofilm in AHUs. Very practical & affordable, prevents efficiency losses & ⬇️ annual maintenance.

@ExtroSpecteur @R_S_P_H @ADPHUK @FPH @IndependentSage @theAliceRoberts @globalhlthtwit I never had any experience with UV use before the pandemic. Ventilation and filtration is much more common. So many new products have come on the market. I needed to learn about them like everyone else.
